activities:
WeLink is a location based social media monitoring and engagement platform for the enterprise. Businesses, brands, events, schools, and municipalities use this powerful tool to obtain social insight about their clients at any location in the world. 

Through geo-fencing technology WeLink Social captures all geo-tagged social data that customers are sharing through social media channels within a predefined radius. In real time, WeLink Social captures Twitter feeds, Instagram photos, Foursquare check-ins, and feeds from available other social media channels. The collected social data is displayed on a sophisticatedly simple, feature rich dashboard, designed to drive your business's core values, customer engagement, and market intelligence.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal information comprise the name, address, and email address of the user that is submitted online by the user when signing up for the service.
privacyprograms: We have a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech:
We are further committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU and US-Swiss Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the JAMS Alternative Dispute Resolution (http://www.jamsadr.com/). 
If we do not provide timely acknowledgment of complaints, or if complaint is not satisfactorily addressed the URL http://www.jamsadr.com/safe-harbor-claim/ can be visited for more information and to file a complaint.
